subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Javier Arenas ran back a punt 80 yards for one touchdown and set up a score with another long return as the Crimson Tide defeated visiting Mississippi State, 32-7.
snippet: Javier Arenas ran back a punt 80 yards for one touchdown and set up a score with another long return as the Crimson Tide defeated visiting Mississippi State, 32-7.
